actions.name: Briar Patch
actions.description: Effect: Thick, thorny bushes quickly spread across surfaces within the [Blast X] area. A creature that moves through spaces containing the Hazard takes a Tick of Grass-Type damage for every meter they travel. If a creature moves at least 3 meters through the Hazard, they gain @Affliction[splinter] 5. The presence of Sunny Weather and Grassy Terrain reduces the number of meters required to cause @Affliction[splinter] by 1 each.
